alert.note: Alert for Arches, Grand Flat; Canyonlands, Natural Bridges (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 02 at 2:15AM MST until December 02 at 3:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...In Colorado, Grand Valley, Debeque to Silt Corridor, Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin, Upper Gunnison River Valley and Paradox Valley/Lower Dolores River. In Utah, Arches/Grand Flat and Canyonlands/Natural Bridges. * WHEN...Until 3 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.

area.areaDesc: Arches, Grand Flat; Canyonlands, Natural Bridges
